```{r}
devtools::install()
require(steward)
```


```{r}
head(chickwts)
```

```{r}
cw_skeleton <- stw_df_skeleton(chickwts)
class(cw_skeleton)
cat(all.equal(cw_skeleton, chickwts), sep = "\n")
```

```{r}
attr(cw_skeleton, "stw_meta")
attr(cw_skeleton, "stw_var_meta")
```

```{r}
write_stw(cw_skeleton, "chickwts.csv")
# currently vunerable to changes in path 
```

```{r}
chickwts2 <- read_stw("chickwts2.csv")
attr(chickwts2, "stw_meta")
attr(chickwts2, "stw_var_meta")
```
